Articles.Content: I have downloaded the demv mk5 ant and rat. But when I open the game they are not in any parts section. Help please.
I copied it into the game data folder. I just got the game yesterday, so I'm not so sure of what I'm doing

it should work but don't worry this happens a lot to many people

to fix it just copy the parts and put it directly into the parts folder in KSP_Win

The mods are out of date for the current version of KSP.

To get them work, I just had to put them in the KSP_win folder, and for each of them I've deleted the Plugin folder to just use the CleverBobCat.dll from the HOME_1.0.5 pack.

Btw, don't forget to add to each Part.cfg the new lines of the 0.20 directory structure :

At the very beginning of your config files :

PART

{

And at the end :

}

That's all.

Oh, and there's a little problem between the size of the chassy and the pod of the mk2. To correct this, I just modified the rescaleFactor = 1 of the pod to 0.8.

Hoping this will be usefull
